main event: An unidentified object, resembling a plane but without wings or tail, was observed near the Randall School in Shrewsbury, Massachusetts on April 13, 1969.
interesting points: The object made noise similar to a jet engine., Almost the entire school witnessed the object., Two teachers specifically observed it disappear from sight., The sighting occurred quickly, preventing children from noticing it., The investigation is required due to the unusual nature of the report.
witness description: students and teachers at the Randall School
